00038 /// scope for types related to amino acids
00039 namespace AminoAcid {

00041 
00042 /// enumeration of the amino acids 
00043 enum PWIZ_API_DECL Type 
00044 {
00045     Alanine,
00046     Cysteine,
00047     AsparticAcid,
00048     GlutamicAcid,
00049     Phenylalanine,
00050     Glycine,
00051     Histidine,
00052     Isoleucine,
00053     Lysine,
00054     Leucine,
00055     Methionine,
00056     Asparagine,
00057     Proline,
00058     Glutamine,
00059     Arginine,
00060     Serine,
00061     Threonine,
00062     Valine,
00063     Tryptophan,
00064     Tyrosine,
00065     AspX,
00066     GlutX,
00067     Unknown
00068 };
00069 
00070 
00071 /// class for accessing information about the amino acids
00072 class PWIZ_API_DECL Info 
00073 {
00074     public:
00075 
00076     Info();
00077     ~Info();
00078 
00079     /// struct for holding data for a single amino acid
00080     struct Record 
00081     {
00082         std::string name; 
00083         std::string abbreviation; 
00084         char symbol; 
00085         Chemistry::Formula formula;
00086         double abundance;
00087     };
00088 
00089     /// returns the amino acid's Record by type
00090     const Record& operator[](Type type) const;
00091 
00092     /// returns the amino acid's Record by symbol (may throw) 
00093     const Record& operator[](char symbol) const;
00094 
00095     private:
00096     class Impl;
00097     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00098     Info(const Info&);
00099     const Info& operator=(const Info&);
00100 };
